page.title: 10The Squash and Tennis Club
page.content: The Weald Squash and Tennis Club, Hassocks, draws most of its membership from Hassocks, Burgess Hill and Hurstpierpoint. It is the main{raquet sporting club}in the area. There are about fifteen tennis courts, (ten grass, five all weather), and four squash courts. Adults can play in the Internal Leagues against others of a similar standard, and children can play on Saturday afternoons. This period of time is called Junior Squash and there are leagues too. There are family bar_b_ques and often discos and other social functions in the bar upstairs. In the club house there are facilities for darts, pool and table_tennis.
